description: Module to manage external providers in oVirt/RHV

username.description: Username to be used for login to external provider.

read_only.description: Specify if the network should be read only.

url.description: URL where external provider is hosted.

poll_interval.description: Number of the seconds the module waits until another poll request on entity status is sent.

state.description: Should the external be present or absent

auth.description: Dictionary with values needed to create HTTP/HTTPS connection to oVirt:

name.description: Name of the external provider to manage.

fetch_nested.description: If I(True) the module will fetch additional data from the API.

authentication_url.description: Keystone authentication URL of the openstack provider.

nested_attributes.description: Specifies list of the attributes which should be fetched from the API.

timeout.description: The amount of time in seconds the module should wait for the instance to get into desired state.

data_center.description: Name of the data center where provider should be attached.

password.description: Password of the user specified in C(username) parameter.

network_type.description: Type of the external network provider either external (for example OVN) or neutron.

wait.description: I(True) if the module should wait for the entity to get into desired state.
